Key Match Events: Donovan Mitchell scored 30 points including a jumper with three-tenths of a second left to secure the victory.
Damian Lillard had a brilliant performance with 41 points, nine assists, and shot 10 of 15 from 3-point range.
Giannis Antetokounmpo contributed 34 points, 16 rebounds, and nine assists for the Bucks.
The Bucks played without Khris Middleton, who is recovering from surgery on his ankles.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cleveland Cavaliers are now 7-0 and one win away from matching their best start in franchise history.
The Milwaukee Bucks have lost five straight games since winning their opener.
Lillard's 10 3-pointers were his most since joining the Bucks last season.
The teams are set to meet again on Monday in Cleveland.
